questions.question: A model has very low error on training data but very high error on validation data. This is a clear sign of:

explanations.a: Underfitting shows high error on both training and validation.
explanations.b: Correct! Large gap between training and validation performance indicates overfitting.
explanations.c: Good generalization means similar low error on both sets.
explanations.d: This is a consequence, not the diagnosis.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an effective way to reduce overfitting?

answers.c: Increasing model depth from 10 to 100 layers

explanations.a: Dropout reduces overfitting by randomly ignoring neurons.
explanations.c: Correct! Dramatically increasing model complexity usually worsens overfitting.
explanations.d: Early stopping prevents excessive fitting to noise.

questions.question: In the bias-variance tradeoff, underfitting is mainly caused by:

explanations.b: Correct! Underfitting occurs when the model is too simple and has high bias.
explanations.d: More data helps reduce overfitting, not cause underfitting.

questions.question: What is the main purpose of a validation set during training?

answers.b: To make the final performance report
answers.c: To tune hyperparameters and monitor for overfitting
answers.d: To replace the test set when data is limited

explanations.a: Weights are updated only on the training set.
explanations.b: Final report uses the untouched test set.
explanations.c: Correct! Validation set is used for model selection, early stopping, and hyperparameter tuning.
explanations.d: Test set must remain isolated; validation is separate.

questions.question: Which technique directly reduces model variance without significantly increasing bias?

answers.c: Switching from a decision tree to a linear model

explanations.b: Correct! More data is the most effective way to reduce variance (overfitting).
explanations.c: This reduces variance but greatly increases bias.

questions.question: A model performs poorly on the training set itself. The best first step to improve it is:

answers.b: Increase model capacity or train longer

explanations.a: Regularization will make performance even worse.
explanations.b: Correct! If training error is high, the model is underfitting — increase capacity or train more training.
explanations.d: May slow learning but doesn't solve capacity issue.
